Wedding Places.name: Radisson Hotel Chicago O'Hare
Wedding Places.description: This hotel is next to our venue and offers a discounted rate for guests mentioning our wedding.

Nearby Attractions.name: Allstate Arena
Nearby Attractions.description: This arena is home to Chicago Wolves hockey games and DePaul basketball games, as well as major music concert events

Nearby Attractions.name: MB Financial Park at Rosemont
Nearby Attractions.description: A variety of dining and entertainment options, notably Muvico - a very fancy theatre experience

Nearby Attractions.name: McDonald's Museum
Nearby Attractions.description: A commemoration of the "first" McDonalds by what would become the modern McDonalds Corporation

Chicago Attractions.name: Baha'i House of Worship
Chicago Attractions.description: There are only a handful of temples from the persecuted Bahá'í faith, and this is the only one in North America. It is open to the public every day, whether to worship in the auditorium, learn some history in the welcome center, or just enjoy the scenic garden.

Chicago Attractions.name: The Field Museum of Natural History
Chicago Attractions.description: A first-rate history museum. The 'Evolving Planet' is highly recommended.

Chicago Attractions.name: Lincoln Park Zoo
Chicago Attractions.description: One of the most influential architects in Chicago once said, "The Lakefront by right belongs to the people." The free Lincoln Park Zoo (and the parkland to the north and south of it) embody this concept.

Chicago Attractions.name: The Art Institute of Chicago
Chicago Attractions.description: An extensive art museum. If high school wasn't too long ago, you're likely to recognize famous pieces from art classes.

Chicago Attractions.name: Museum of Science and Industry
Chicago Attractions.description: Visit here. Really, if you are into coal, model trains, WWII subs, weather, farming, history,…

Chicago Attractions.name: Mag Mile
Chicago Attractions.description: The notable shopping district. Horse-drawn carriages gives tours from the historic Water Tower at the north part of the Mag Mile.
